PHRASE.LANG: Doctor Who ™ - Le Costume de River Song
Doctor Who - Kostüm des River Song
Doctor Who - Costume del River Song
Doctor Who - Traje del River Song

Hello sweetie! This is the costume of Professor River Song, archaeologist, child of the TARDIS and possessor of lethal lipstick. A time traveller with a journal packed full of spoilers. Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

Salut mon chéri ! Voici le costume du Professeur River Song, archéologue, enfant de Tardis et détentrice du rouge à lèvre fatal. Voyageuse dand le temps avec un journal de bord rempli d'aventures. Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

Hallo, mein Süßer! Das ist das Kostüm von Professorin River Song, Archäologin, Kind der TARDIS und Besitzerin eines tödlichen Lippenstifts. Eine Zeitreisende mit einem Tagebuch voller Spaßverderber. Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

Ciao, dolcezza! Questo è il costume della professoressa River Song, archeologa e figlia del TARDIS, con un rossetto letale sempre in tasca. Una viaggiatrice nel tempo con un diario pieno di spoiler. Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

¡Hola, encanto! Este es el traje del Profesor River Song, arqueólogo, hijo de la TARDIS y poseedor del pintalabios letal. Un viajero del tiempo con un diario lleno de sorpresas. Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]
